Woah, woah, woah, woah, woah! What's going on here?
Why are you not dead? What is the meaning of this?
Who are you anyways? You know what? I don't care. I'm just gonna make sur this doesn't happen again.
Let's reset this and see what we can do. So, 3 hearts? Check. Zero coins? Check. Remove "weapons"? Check. Get rid of the "trinkets?" Check.
Trinket: Heal Heart(s) when entering a shop.
Weapon: Shoot bubbles to capture enemies and push them back. Deals damage when popped. Will aim at random target.
Weapon: Hit enemies in an arc around you. Will aim the the closest enemy if possible.
Trinket: Look cool and stylish while dealing extra damage with more critical chance and critical damage.
Weapon: Thow knives at enemies. Will target enemies in range.
PROTEIN! GET YOUR MUSCLE ON AND DO MORE DAMAGE WITH PROTEIN!
Weapon: Spawn tornados at random poritions on the map that move towards you.
Ok, you've done that enough. Let's see if you can do it again.
And off to the start you go!
